name: Create new DocuGenerate PDFs from new Tally submissions
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in Tally, Make will automatically generate a PDF document using DocuGenerate.
You can easily customize this workflow with your own form fields and document templates. 
Follow our step-by-step guide on [creating reports from Tally submissions](https://www.docugenerate.com/blog/use-tally-and-make-to-generate-reports-based-on-form-submission/?utm_source=make&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=template_16556).
Created by DocuGenerate. [Contact us](mailto:support@docugenerate.com) if you have any questions.
